column1: business of the Appellant being a permanent establishment (PE) under Article
7(3) of the DTAA between Sri Lanka and India. Article 7(3) of the DTAA between
Sri Lanka and India reads as follows:
“the determination of the profits of a permanent establishment, there shall
be allowed as deductions expenses which are incurred for the purpose of
the  business  of  the  permanent  establishment  including  executive  and
general administrative expenses so incurred, whether in the State in which
the permanent establishment is situated, or elsewhere”.
